Title: Prohibits use of gift certificates, open loop gift certificates, and e-wallets for mobile sports wagering
Summary: Prohibits mobile sports wagering operators from enabling or otherwise permitting authorized sports bettors to deposit or withdraw funds to or from their account through gift certificates, open loop gift certificates, or e-wallets.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to prohibiting use of gift certificates, open loop gift certificates, and e-wallets for mobile sports wagering
